content: Write backend/src/main.rs: Full Actix-web server with /ws (WebSocket echo + periodic JSON broadcast) and /health. Background task: simulate cpu_usage (sine wave) & battery_level (random).
Write backend/Cargo.toml: Package backend. Deps: actix-web, actix-ws, actix-rt, serde, serde_json, tokio.
Write frontend/src/App.vue: Vue 3 <script setup>. Connect to ws://localhost:8080/ws. UI: Cyberpunk style (black bg, neon green text). Show real-time bars for cpu_usage and battery_level.
Write frontend/package.json: Name frontend, type module. Scripts: dev, build. Deps: vue. DevDeps: vite, @vitejs/plugin-vue.
Write db/init.sql: Schema. Table timeseries_data (id, ts, value). Table alerts (id, msg, level). Insert 5 dummy alert records ('CRITICAL', 'System Overload').
Write docker-compose.yml: Services: backend (port 8080), frontend (port 80), db (postgres:15, port 5432), redis (redis:alpine, port 6379). Link them up.
